name: coloradan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Colorado: I'm glad to see you are a Coloradan too! Nearly one in five Coloradans has no health insurance.
More examplesFewer examplesLazar is a native Coloradan who teaches at Hofstra University.The poll showed that Coloradans' top concern remains growth and traffic congestion.This bill is of great interest to Coloradoans.

belonging or relating to the US state of Colorado or its people: The area is indistinguishable from the rest of the east Coloradan prairie. One Coloradoan newspaper reported that advertisers have pulled $30,000 worth of advertising.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was born in the Coloradan town of Eldora.The Coloradoan women in the photograph are preparing to vote.Situated at an altitude of 8.600ft in the San Juan Mountains is the Coloradan resort Dunton Hot Springs.
